fields.name: chiefComplaint
fields.defaultValue: Ear pain, fever, and hearing loss.
fields.label: Chief Complaint

fields.name: socialHistory
fields.defaultValue: Common in children, especially those who attend daycare.
fields.label: Social History

fields.name: physicalExam
fields.defaultValue: Red, bulging tympanic membrane with decreased mobility.
fields.label: Physical Exam

fields.name: treatment
fields.defaultValue: Antibiotics if bacterial and severe, pain management
fields.label: Treatment

fields.name: carePlan
fields.defaultValue: Avoid smoke exposure, consider pneumococcal vaccine
fields.label: Care Plan

fields.name: chiefComplaint
fields.defaultValue: Nasal congestion, facial pain/pressure, reduced sense of smell.
fields.label: Chief Complaint

fields.name: socialHistory
fields.defaultValue: History of allergies or nasal polyps.
fields.label: Social History

fields.name: physicalExam
fields.defaultValue: Purulent nasal discharge, nasal mucosal oedema, tenderness over sinuses.
fields.label: Physical Exam

fields.name: treatment
fields.defaultValue: Nasal corticosteroids, saline irrigation, antibiotics if bacterial
fields.label: Treatment

fields.name: systemsSurvey
fields.defaultValue: Exposure to viral or bacterial pathogens.
fields.label: Systems Survey

fields.name: physicalExam
fields.defaultValue: Swollen, erythematous tonsils with or without exudate.
fields.label: Physical Exam

fields.name: treatment
fields.defaultValue: Pain relievers, antibiotics for bacterial infection
fields.label: Treatment

fields.name: carePlan
fields.defaultValue: Throat lozenges, warm saline gargles, rest
fields.label: Care Plan

fields.name: socialHistory
fields.defaultValue: Overuse of voice, exposure to irritants.
fields.label: Social History

fields.name: physicalExam
fields.defaultValue: Vocal cord swelling and redness seen on laryngoscopy.
fields.label: Physical Exam

fields.name: carePlan
fields.defaultValue: Avoid shouting or whispering, steam inhalation
fields.label: Care Plan

fields.name: chiefComplaint
fields.defaultValue: Bleeding from one or both nostrils.
fields.label: Chief Complaint

fields.name: systemsSurvey
fields.defaultValue: Anterior nasal septum bleeding most common.
fields.label: Systems Survey

fields.name: physicalExam
fields.defaultValue: Active bleeding or clot in the nasal cavity, usually anterior.
fields.label: Physical Exam

fields.name: treatment
fields.defaultValue: Nasal pressure, topical vasoconstrictors, cauterisation if recurrent
fields.label: Treatment

fields.name: carePlan
fields.defaultValue: Keep nasal passages moist, avoid picking or blowing nose hard
fields.label: Care Plan

fields.name: chiefComplaint
fields.defaultValue: Vertigo, hearing loss, tinnitus, and a feeling of fullness in one ear.
fields.label: Chief Complaint

fields.name: socialHistory
fields.defaultValue: Idiopathic, but potential links to fluid balance.
fields.label: Social History

fields.name: physicalExam
fields.defaultValue: Normal ear exam between episodes; audiometry shows low to mid-frequency hearing loss.
fields.label: Physical Exam

fields.name: treatment
fields.defaultValue: Low sodium diet, diuretics, vestibular rehabilitation
fields.label: Treatment

fields.name: carePlan
fields.defaultValue: Avoid caffeine and alcohol, manage stress
fields.label: Care Plan

fields.name: chiefComplaint
fields.defaultValue: Loud snoring, daytime sleepiness, observed pauses in breathing during sleep.
fields.label: Chief Complaint

fields.name: physicalExam
fields.defaultValue: Enlarged tonsils, narrow airway; obesity may be present.
fields.label: Physical Exam

fields.name: treatment
fields.defaultValue: CPAP therapy, weight loss, possibly surgery
fields.label: Treatment

fields.name: socialHistory
fields.defaultValue: Singers, teachers, and other heavy voice users.
fields.label: Social History

fields.name: physicalExam
fields.defaultValue: Bilateral nodules on the vocal cords seen during laryngoscopy.
fields.label: Physical Exam

fields.name: carePlan
fields.defaultValue: Avoid yelling or whispering, proper vocal technique
fields.label: Care Plan

fields.name: chiefComplaint
fields.defaultValue: Nasal congestion, reduced sense of smell, postnasal drip.
fields.label: Chief Complaint

fields.name: physicalExam
fields.defaultValue: Pale, oedematous masses within the nasal cavity seen on endoscopy.
fields.label: Physical Exam

fields.name: differentialDiagnosis
fields.defaultValue: Chronic rhino-sinusitis without polyps, turbinate hypertrophy
fields.label: Differential Diagnosis

fields.name: treatment
fields.defaultValue: Corticosteroid nasal sprays, oral corticosteroids, surgery if severe
fields.label: Treatment

fields.name: carePlan
fields.defaultValue: Manage allergies and asthma, saline nasal rinses
fields.label: Care Plan

fields.name: chiefComplaint
fields.defaultValue: Hearing loss, tinnitus, and balance issues on one side.
fields.label: Chief Complaint

fields.name: socialHistory
fields.defaultValue: Unknown; rare links to neurofibromatosis type 2.
fields.label: Social History

fields.name: physicalExam
fields.defaultValue: Unilateral hearing loss; MRI confirms intracranial tumour on the vestibulocochlear nerve.
fields.label: Physical Exam

fields.name: carePlan
fields.defaultValue: Hearing aids if needed, balance therapy
fields.label: Care Plan

fields.name: chiefComplaint
fields.defaultValue: Ear pain, discharge, itching, and reduced hearing.
fields.label: Chief Complaint

fields.name: physicalExam
fields.defaultValue: Ear canal erythema, oedema, and otorrhea; tragal tenderness.
fields.label: Physical Exam

fields.name: carePlan
fields.defaultValue: Keep ear dry, avoid inserting objects
fields.label: Care Plan

fields.name: chiefComplaint
fields.defaultValue: Sneezing, nasal itching, congestion, and rhinorrhea.
fields.label: Chief Complaint

fields.name: socialHistory
fields.defaultValue: Exposure to allergens like pollen, dust mites.
fields.label: Social History

fields.name: physicalExam
fields.defaultValue: Pale, boggy nasal mucosa; nasal congestion.
fields.label: Physical Exam

fields.name: carePlan
fields.defaultValue: Environmental control measures, consider allergy testing
fields.label: Care Plan

fields.name: chiefComplaint
fields.defaultValue: Sore throat, difficulty swallowing, possible fever.
fields.label: Chief Complaint

fields.name: physicalExam
fields.defaultValue: Red, swollen pharynx; may have tonsillar exudate.
fields.label: Physical Exam

fields.name: treatment
fields.defaultValue: Analgesics, throat lozenges, antibiotics if bacterial
fields.label: Treatment

fields.name: chiefComplaint
fields.defaultValue: Nasal blockage, reduced sense of smell, postnasal drip.
fields.label: Chief Complaint

fields.name: physicalExam
fields.defaultValue: Visible polyps in nasal cavity or sinus openings.
fields.label: Physical Exam

fields.name: treatment
fields.defaultValue: Corticosteroids, endoscopic sinus surgery for severe cases
fields.label: Treatment

fields.name: chiefComplaint
fields.defaultValue: Rapid onset sore throat, fever, difficulty breathing, drooling.
fields.label: Chief Complaint

fields.name: physicalExam
fields.defaultValue: Cherry-red, swollen epiglottis visible on laryngoscopy.
fields.label: Physical Exam

fields.name: carePlan
fields.defaultValue: Urgent hospital admission, intubation if necessary
fields.label: Care Plan

fields.name: chiefComplaint
fields.defaultValue: Severe sore throat, fever, drooling, difficulty opening the mouth (trismus), and a muffled or “hot potato” voice.
fields.label: Chief Complaint

fields.name: socialHistory
fields.defaultValue: Most often occurs in teens and young adults, history of recurrent tonsillitis.
fields.label: Social History

fields.name: systemsSurvey
fields.defaultValue: A collection of pus forming near the tonsils, often as a complication of untreated or inadequately treated tonsillitis.
fields.label: Systems Survey

fields.name: physicalExam
fields.defaultValue: Swelling of the peritonsillar area, uvula deviation to the opposite side, tonsillar erythema and exudate.
fields.label: Physical Exam

fields.name: treatment
fields.defaultValue: Needle aspiration or incision and drainage, antibiotics, pain management
fields.label: Treatment

fields.name: carePlan
fields.defaultValue: Ensure adequate hydration, follow-up to assess for resolution or the need for tonsillectomy
fields.label: Care Plan

fields.name: accurex
fields.defaultValue: Review signs of airway obstruction or spread of infection requiring immediate attention
fields.label: Accurex Message
